TEXT.TITLE: MOLECULAR GENETICS INC <MOGN> 4TH QTR LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr loss 22 cts vs loss 13 cts Oper net loss 1,712,916 vs loss 769,539 Revs 2,292,972 vs 2,157,895 Avg shrs 7,961,602 vs 6,200,293 Year Oper shr loss 53 cts vs loss 45 cts Oper net loss 3,562,151 vs 2,543,366 Revs 9,117,311 vs 8,251,136 Avg shrs 7,169,871 vs 6,186,51 NOTE: Current year net both periods excludes charge 430,649 dlrs from cumulative effect of accounting change for patents. 1986 net both periods includes charge of about 458,000 dlrs from severance obligations. 1986 year net includes charge 156,000 dlrs from writeoff of seed commitments.
